entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse What cost so many lives in the US is not China. The high death rate was caused by a predsident more concerned about the 2020 election then any coronavirus. This is the responsibility of Donald Trump, period.
